Class ObjectStorageImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.db.ObjectStorageImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectStorage

    public class ObjectStorageImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectStorage
    Implementation of ObjectStorage Interface. Contains methods to access Object Database.
    Version:
    1.0a
    Author:
    RnDMizeD

      ObjectStorageImplementation(java.lang.String dbName)
